# The following data set is an example data set to establish some basic skills within RMarkdown. The goal for this is basic exercise to calculate the mean for a given column, ignoring the unknown (NA) values. 
> df <- data.frame(drug1 = c(4,5,6, NA), drug2 = c(6,7,8, NA), drug3 = c(8, 9, 10, NA))
> mean(df$drug1, na.rm=TRUE)
[1] 5
